ygData.subject: Re: Rathe Mnts
ygData.msgSnippet: Bellow - direct damage Chords - ae damage - dont use if enchanter is mesmorizing Anthem - tank buff Healing - after battle Largos - slow down and debuff mobs
ygData.messageBody:
Bellow - direct damage
Chords - ae damage - dont use if enchanter is mesmorizing
Anthem - tank buff
Healing - after battle
Largos - slow down and debuff mobs
Selos - just in case!~
Elemental &/or Guardian - buffs party AC (may help your casters take a bit
more dmg)

Some ideas for you!

Sylly.

p.s. watch out for those clops! they are meanies!

----- Original Message -----
From: TommyC <uber_sorcerer@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 10, 2000 6:27 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Rathe Mnts


> From: "TommyC" <uber_sorcerer@...>
>
> Hiya and thanks for all the advice from my last post :-)
> so one more question...My guild is going to the Rathe Mnts this week to
kill HG and Giant Skellys at the ruins, we will pull the HG's to the ruins
2-3 groups one group (mine) will be fighting GSkellys, what songs do ye
recomend for me to arm? I'm 22nd level the group i'm in is caster and druid
heavy but we may have a second bard the 2 HG groups are Tank heavy with an
enchanter and druid and wiz backup.
> *************************************
> Pinen Warsong
> Hopeless Bard of the Rathe
> Capt. of the Noble Warriors of Norrath
> Bard of the 22nd Song
> *************************************
> *******ALWAYS REMEMBER********************
> When in doubt, knock 'em out!
> -"Big Vinny" NYC Hells Angles c.1976
> Art Saves Lives
> Sometimes you flog a dead horse and it comes back to life.
> Wear your best Scotchguarded Polyester, just to be safe.
> Sweat Heavy, Rythmic drops of Red,red blood!
> I haven't felt this good about my body in days.
> Play what you mean.
> And I'll have the Poo-Poo Platter, Sir.
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
